<!-- Start with Single Sign-On -->
      <style type="text/css">
        
        body {
          background: transparent
        }
        
        li {
          list-style-type: none;
          padding: 0 0 10px 0;
          margin: 0;
        }
        ul {
          padding: 0;
          margin: 0;
        }
      </style>
      <!-- <script type="text/javascript" src="http://example.com/gadgets/sso.js"></script> -->
      <script type="text/javascript">

        <!-- Fetch the array of content matches. -->
        matches = google.contentmatch.getContentMatches();
        var matchList = document.createElement('UL');
        var listItem;
        var extractedText;
        var listHeight = 0;
        var singleHeight = 81;
        var setsHeight = 200;
        var curHeight;
        
        var reservedWords = new Array("accounts","activate","admin","announcements","api","apps","artworks","assets",
        "comments","community-guidelines","connect","customize","creativecommons"
        "dashboard","dropbox",
        "emails","errors","events",
        "faqs","favorites","feedbacks","feeds","for","forums",
        "gifts","groups","guestlist","genres",
        "hot",
        "invite","imprint",
        "latest","login","logout",
        "me","messages","music",
        "newsletters",
        "oauth","oauth2","orders",
        "oembed",
        "pages","partners","people","player","playlists","posts","press","pro","press_release",
        "search","session","sets","settings","signup","stats","stream","subscription",
        "terms-of-use","tour","tracks","turn_off_notifications","tags",
        "upload","users",
        "videos",
        "waveform","widgets",
        "widget.xml","widget","widget.json",
        "you",
        "contacts","fans","faq","logged_exceptions","robots","soundcloud","topics");        

        <!-- Iterate through the array and display output for each match. -->
        for (var match in matches) {
                
                  
          if (!matches[match]['url'].match(new RegExp("(soundcloud.com\/.+\/dropbox)")) && matches[match]['url'].match(new RegExp("(((https?\:\/\/)?)(www\.)?soundcloud.com\/[^<\/]+\/((sets\/[^<\/]+)|[^<\/]+)($|\/[^<\/]+))$"))) { // match only soundcloud.com links
            
            listItem = document.createElement('LI');
            
            if(matches[match]['url'].search(/\/sets\//) != -1) {
              listHeight += (setsHeight+10);
              curHeight = setsHeight;
            } else {
              listHeight += (singleHeight+10);
              curHeight = singleHeight;
            }

            listItem.innerHTML = '<object height="' + curHeight + '" width="100%"> <param name="movie" value="http://player.soundcloud.com/player.swf?url=' + encodeURIComponent(matches[match]['url']) + '"></param> <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param> <embed allowscriptaccess="always" height="' + curHeight + '" src="http://player.soundcloud.com/player.swf?url=' + encodeURIComponent(matches[match]['url']) + '" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="100%"></embed> </object>';
            
            //listItem.innerHTML = matches[match]['url'];
            
            matchList.appendChild(listItem);
          }
        }
        document.body.appendChild(matchList);
        gadgets.window.adjustHeight(listHeight+12);
      </script>
